bool ThreadHandle::equals ( ThreadHandle const *  threadHandle) const

Complate two thread handles.

Parameters
threadHandle- target thread handle.
Returns
If current thread handle and target thread handle are the same, return true. If current thread handle and target thread handle are different, return false.
